name: Jude Marcella
title: The Snow Globe
webInstructionsHTML: Follow the link to experience The Snow Globe
artworkHTML: This interactive virtual museum presents extracts from five films by early cinema pioneer George Méliès made between the years 1896-1903. The piece deals with embodiment in digital space, and responds to the affect of hypertextual flatness.

events.title: Remote Artist Spotlight
events.desc: Pre-recorded demos from some of our remote artists

events.title: Discussion Panel: Do we need the Tate and the Whitecube when we have Instagram and Animal Crossing
events.desc: This panel is a chance to hear a student lead discussion around how digital technology is shaping the where artwork is shown and how it is made, from changes in location to acsessibility to the masses.
